tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DeskBooking (
  booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  desk_id INT NOT NULL,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  booking_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE desk_booking (
    desk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    date_booked DATE,
    time_slot_start TIME,
    time_slot_end TIME
);

CREATE TABLE desk_booking (
  desk_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  booking_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE hot_desking (
  desk_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  booking_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE DeskBooking (
  booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  desk_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE HotDesking (
  hotdesk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  desk_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE DeskBooking (
  booking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  desk_id UUID NOT NULL,
  employee_id UUID NOT NULL,
  booking_date DATE NOT NULL,
  start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  end_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Employee (
  employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  department VARCHAR(50),
  role VARCHAR(50)
);
